title: Andrew Cannon from Santa Cruz Skateboards
itunes:title: Andrew Cannon from Santa Cruz Skateboards
description:
Today is a special episode with my friend, Andrew Cannon. He’s the brand manager from Santa Cruz Skateboards as well as singing for an incredible band called Worship. We get deep and philosophical about the origin of his love for independent music, health and DNA. I am really glad we got to paint with a broad brush in this episode and hope you enjoy!

This bonus episode is sponsored exclusively by 23&Me. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
